item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, February 1, 2025 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:

10. In Zig, what's a writer? (74 points | 29 comments)
11. Show HN: Perforator – cluster-wide profiling tool for large data centers (35 points | 9 comments)

24. Shades of Blunders (26 points | 8 comments)
25. Hoppscotch: Open source alternative to Postman / Insomnia (116 points | 86 comments)
26. FBI, Dutch police disrupt 'Manipulaters' phishing gang (142 points | 48 comments)
27. The Tensor Cookbook (2024) (153 points | 19 comments)

29. Scientists find links between Alzheimer's, herpes, and head trauma (153 points | 61 comments)
